data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during ESTAFETTE cruise from Batavia to Hellevoetsluis started at 1853-11-16
Ship: Estafette (Bark), Voyage: Batavia - Hellevoetsluis, 1st Observer: D. Hofker (Kapitein), Other ship information: REIS 42, P. 210-EIND
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
